entry.title: DraouM/StockFlow: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
entry.content: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.

entry.title: garydavisonos/validate-form-fields: A lightweight, zero-dependency JavaScript/TypeScript library for validating form inputs with customisable rules. Supports length limits, alphanumeric enforcement, HTML blocking, and more.

entry.title: canyon/3d-web-viewer: This project is a lightweight web application developed with ReactJS and TailwindCSS. It enables the visualization of 3D point cloud data and incorporates basic GIS viewing features.

entry.title: paulio11/pixel-paint: Pixel Paint is a lightweight pixel art tool built using React. Developed as a one-day project, it offers an intuitive interface for creating and editing pixel-based designs.

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
